next_chat_instructions.name: CORE_OPERATIONS
entities_to_build: TRADEOS_DASHBOARD.lds.json - KPIs, revenue, jobs today, weather

next_chat_instructions.command_for_next_chat: Continue building TradeOS Phase 2. Reference /mnt/project/tradeos/TRADEOS_MASTER_INDEX.lds.json and Phase 1 entities. Build the CORE_OPERATIONS tier: Dashboard, Scheduling, Dispatch, and Jobs components. Each as a self-contained .lds.json entity file.

assembly_preview.how: Create TRADEOS_ASSEMBLER.lds.json that extracts code from all entities, resolves imports, and produces single index.html with embedded React app
assembly_preview.output: Deployable artifact with full LDS streaming architecture
